name: Run - Treadmill
how_to_perform:
1. Begin by standing on the side rails of the treadmill to safely start the machine.
2. Turn on the treadmill and set the desired speed, starting at a low speed for a warm-up.
3. Grip the side rails firmly and step onto the treadmill deck, starting with a brisk walk.
4. After warming up for 5-10 minutes, gradually increase the speed to your desired running pace.
5. Maintain an upright posture, keeping your head up, shoulders relaxed, and core engaged.
6. Focus on striking the treadmill deck with the midfoot and rolling through the toes with each step, keeping a consistent stride.
7. Swing your arms naturally at your sides to help maintain balance and momentum.
8. If you need to adjust settings, carefully use the treadmill controls, possibly on the console.
9. Cool down by gradually reducing speed back down to a walk for the last 5-10 minutes of your session.
10. Use the side rails to assist in stepping off the treadmill safely once stopped.
short_summary: Running on a treadmill is a cardiovascular exercise that burns calories and strengthens lower body muscles.
